## Coming soon

This guide will show you how to integrate existing scikit-learn pipelines with Xorq.

You will learn how to wrap sklearn objects for deferred execution and caching.

**What you'll accomplish:**
- Wrap sklearn pipelines
- Preserve sklearn API compatibility
- Enable caching for fitted pipelines
- Deploy sklearn models

**Prerequisites:**
- Familiarity with scikit-learn
- Existing sklearn pipeline

Check back soon for the complete guide.
